Introduction

Xindy (formerly known as Chae Ha and Chaewon) is a South Korean trainee currently under Liz Entertainment. She is a member of the project girl group CHIC&IDLE. She is also a former member of the girl group Daydream as Chaeha (채하) and a pre-debut member of the girl group MIDNIGHT and project group DPOP Friends.
